name: Reduced-Threat Ochre Jelly
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

traits.Amorphous: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
traits.Spider Climb: The jelly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.Pseudopod: Melee Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.
